plugin.name: pixswitcher
plugin._long: A plugin to change active window with an animation.

option.name: next_view
option._long: Switches to the next view with the specified key.

option.name: prev_view
option._long: Switches to the previous view with the specified key.

option.name: grid_columns
option._long: Sets the maximum number of columns in the grid.

option.name: grid_margin
option._long: The amount space of the full desktop not used for the grid.

option.name: speed
option._long: Sets the duration of the animation in milliseconds.

option.name: thumbnail_selected_scale
option._long: Sets the thumbnail size for the selected view.

option.name: thumbnail_unselected_scale
option._long: Sets the thumbnail size for the unselected views.
